about_the_game:
Bubble Frog DX is a charming 2D puzzle platformer that brings the magic of retro Game Boy Color games to Steam! Step into the role of Bubble Frog—a frog in a bubble, of course—as you explore four colorful zones, bouncing your way through 50 levels to collect 160 lost Onigiri, scattered by your friend OniGary.

Feeling daring? Test your skills in the Ink Zone—a special 10-level "Super Hard" challenge, where you'll collect all the Ink lost by Squid Face Jones to earn the final 161st Onigiri.

Key Features:

  • Classic Retro Experience: Dive into the original Game Boy Color version of Bubble Frog DX—no remakes here, just pure retro nostalgia!

  • Challenging Gameplay: Navigate vibrant levels filled with obstacles like spikes while collecting Onigiri. Perfect for everyone, with both Normal and Hard modes to choose from.

  • Whimsical Cast of Characters: Meet quirky companions like Naked Mole Rat Unicorns, Aliens, and even Sausage Cat!

  • Vibrant World: Travel across four delightful zones—Pink, Blue, Yellow, and Green, plus a bonus Ink Zone for those looking for an extra challenge.

  • Wholesome Adventure: Enjoy a fun, light-hearted quest—there's no villain here, just helping OniGary find his lost Onigiri!

  • 3D Main Menu Gallery: Explore a 3D gallery featuring fan art, official artwork, and shoutouts to our amazing Kickstarter backers.

Game Modes:

  • Normal Mode: Unlimited lives for a relaxed, enjoyable adventure.

  • Hard Mode: Beat the game with only 20 lives for a true test of your skills!

  • Ink Zone: Face 10 very difficult levels with only 20 lives for those who crave a serious challenge.

    Bubble Frog DX is available for Windows, Mac, Linux, and SteamOS. Get ready to bounce into a retro-inspired adventure and help Bubble Frog recover OniGary's lost Onigiri!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 15 Sequoia
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Bubble Frog DX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Bubble Frog DX is a fun and challenging short Action Puzzle game where you take on the role of a Frog in a Bubble who's been tasked to save 160 Onigiri from all kinds of hazards across 50 levels and 4 colorful zones in this retro throwback title!
